references: Related: Ord 6491, Ord 6355, Ord 5038, Ord 5090, Ord 5070, Ord 6532, Ord 6546
summary: An Ordinance transferring $762.94 from the General Fund to the Special Funds of Local Improvement District Nos. 332, 306, 180, 186, 184, 338, 352 for the purpose of refunding the excess portions of assessment paid by property owners for the various improvements of said Local Improvement Districts, and authorizing and directing the drawing and payments of warrants therefor.
